fields.name: tree
fields.description: Mighty yet delicate, the tree is complemented by a celtic-style border.
fields.material: Coloured pencil drawing on 297 × 210 mm paper.

fields.name: farewell
fields.description: A bittersweet parting. “Nevermore shall I look upon your face.”
fields.material: Coloured pencil drawing on 297 × 210 mm paper.

fields.name: lords
fields.description: Inspired by the Vanyar of Tolkien's Silmarillion.
fields.material: Combined pencil drawing and watercolour painting on 297 × 210 mm paper.

fields.name: princess
fields.description: She waits in silence, the realm's guardian and its prisoner.
fields.material: Combined pencil drawing and watercolour painting on 297 × 210 mm paper.

fields.name: city
fields.description: A place of refuge, inspired by Tolkien's Rivendell.
fields.material: Combined pencil drawing and watercolour painting on 297 × 210 mm paper.

fields.name: twins
fields.description: However far they travel, together is the best place.
fields.material: Combined 1 mm black art pen drawing and watercolour painting on 297 × 210 mm paper.
